verbs.description: If there [V: was] [ARGM-TMP: ever] [ARG1: a perfect metaphor for Donald Trump ’s destruction of American democracy and values] , it is the President ripping up documents in knowing violation of the Presidential Records Act , then having career bureaucrats put them back together ...
